title: World Day against the Death Penalty 10 October (Ministry of Education and Research of the ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Education and Research of the Kingdom of Norway ) Today , 82 % of the world's states have introduced a moratorium on the death penalty or have abolished it. 'I'm pleased to see that the international trend is moving away
